title: G-20 finance chiefs will not issue statement after April 20 meeting - Kyodo News Plus
content: G-20 finance chiefs will not issue statement after April 20 meeting  Kyodo News Plus
description: Finance chiefs from the Group of 20 economies have decided not to issue a joint statement after their April 20 meeting amid conflicts over Russia's participation in the event following its invasion of Ukraine, sources familiar with the matter say.
